text: Plaque where died Louis Seigner in the fire of the building: 12 rue Pierre-et- Marie-Curie, Paris 5th arrond. Louis Seigner (23 June 1903 – 20 January 1991) was a French actor. He was born in Saint-Chef, Isère, France, the son of Louise (Monin) and Joseph Seigner, and died in Paris. He is the father of actress Françoise Seigner, with Marie Cazeaux, and the grandfather of Emmanuelle Seigner, Mathilde Seigner and Marie-Amélie Seigner. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Film |- !
